segments.text: What are you going to do with that vase , Penny ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going to put it on this table , Sam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t do that . Give it to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to do with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m going to put it here , in front of the window .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be careful . Don ’ t drop it ! Don ’ t put it there , Sam . Put it here , on this shelf .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There we are ! It ’ s a lovely vase .
segments.speaker: S1
